description.value:
Frequency once per day

Requirements You're in yaoguai form.

You let out a mighty howl, chant of death, or speak with eerie repetition that plants fear in others. All enemies within 30 feet must attempt a @Check[will|against:class-spell] save against your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 1}.

Failure The target is frightened 1 and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard].

Critical Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 2} and off-guard.
